description: This file implements part of the internal logic for an Advanced Networking Service Container (ANSC) LPC (Lightweight Protocol Converter) connector, specifically the 'imcif' module. It provides functions for constructing party address structures, getting and setting operational modes and party names, checking party connection status, engaging and canceling activities, and initiating call requests. Many functions are stubs returning default values or indicating not applicable, while some handle memory management and property access.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscLpccoImcGenPartyAddr(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,void * buffer,ULONG ulSize)
methods.description: Constructs a 'party_addr' structure from raw buffer data, allocating memory and copying the input buffer into it.

methods.name: ULONG AnscLpccoImcGetLpcOpmode(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Retrieves the current operational mode of the LPC connector object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoImcSetLpcOpmode(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG ulMode)
methods.description: Sets the operational mode of the LPC connector object.

methods.name: char * AnscLpccoImcGetPartyName(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Returns the local party name stored in the connector object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoImcSetPartyName(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * party_name)
methods.description: Sets or updates the local party name in the connector object.

methods.name: BOOL AnscLpccoImcIsPartyConnected(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * party_name,BOOL bOutgoingConn)
methods.description: Checks if a specified party is connected either outgoing or incoming based on party address state.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoImcEngage(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Engages or activates the LPC activity, calling the object's engage method.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoImcCancel(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Cancels or deactivates the LPC activity, calling the object's cancel method.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoImcCallRequest(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * party_name,void * pInputBuffer,ULONG ulInputSize,ANSC_HANDLE * phOutputBdo,PULONG pulErrorCode,ULONG ulTimeout)
methods.description: Stub function intended to initiate an LPC call request by party name, currently returns 'not applicable'.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoImcCallRequest2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hPartyAddr,void * pInputBuffer,ULONG ulInputSize,ANSC_HANDLE * phOutputBdo,PULONG pulErrorCode,ULONG ulTimeout)
methods.description: Stub function intended to initiate an LPC call request by party address, currently returns 'not applicable'.

ctags.name: AnscLpccoImcCallRequest
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * party_name,void * pInputBuffer,ULONG ulInputSize,ANSC_HANDLE * phOutputBdo,PULONG pulErrorCode,ULONG ulTimeout)

ctags.name: AnscLpccoImcCallRequest2
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hPartyAddr,void * pInputBuffer,ULONG ulInputSize,ANSC_HANDLE * phOutputBdo,PULONG pulErrorCode,ULONG ulTimeout)
